alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL CASS AND SOUTHERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper South Long Lake, or near Brainerd, moving southeast at 20 mph. Accumulating pea size hail was observed in the Brainerd and Nisswa areas with these storms. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Upper South Long Lake and South Long Lake around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Garrison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
